_metadata.description: Default assumptions and fallback values for PathFinder Pro simulation engine
_metadata.purpose: Centralizes all default financial and behavioral assumptions previously hardcoded in Go source
_metadata.philosophy: All simulation assumptions should be explicit, configurable, and documented

description: Centralized default assumptions for PathFinder Pro simulation engine

defaultStrategy.name: Balanced Growth
defaultStrategy.description: Default balanced asset allocation suitable for most scenarios

conservativeStrategy.name: Conservative
conservativeStrategy.description: Conservative asset allocation for risk-averse investors

aggressiveStrategy.name: Aggressive Growth
aggressiveStrategy.description: Aggressive asset allocation for growth-focused investors

initialPrices.description: Default initial market prices for backtesting scenarios

backtesting.defaultAcquisitionDateDescription: Default acquisition date for initial holdings when not specified - set to 18 months for realistic mixed short/long-term treatment

ageBasedStrategy.description: Parameters for age-based asset allocation (e.g., '110 - age' rule)

glidePathStrategy.description: Target-date fund style glide path allocation brackets

defaultMonthlyExpenses.description: Default monthly expense assumption when no specific data provided
defaultMonthlyExpenses.justification: Median US household expenses circa 2024, reduced from previous $10k assumption

emergencyFund.description: Default emergency fund target (months of expenses)

safeWithdrawalRate.description: Default safe withdrawal rate for retirement (4% rule)

defaultStateNoTax.description: Fallback for states without income tax

contributionIncrease.description: Default annual contribution increase (salary growth assumption)

inflation.description: Default inflation assumptions for forward projections
